desc: Celebrate your romance with a couple getaway at Bali. You can expect frequent heavy rainfalls with high humidity levels. Don't forget to sample the delicious cuisines at Bali.
Romance on your mind? Plan a trip to Coorg. You can expect pleasant day temperatures with the possibility of a drizzle. The wildlife spottings at Coorg are an added bonus.

subText: Fun-Packed Beach Destination in Sri Lanka
desc: Bentota is an absolute delight for romantic souls. You will love sightseeing and water sports. You will also enjoy the beaches at Bentota.

subText: Heaven in the White Hills of Kashmir
desc: Celebrate your romance with a couple getaway at Gulmarg. You can expect the temperatures drop down to below freezing. The mountain views from Gulmarg are an added bonus.

subText: Picturesque Tropical Getaway in the Andamans
desc: Havelock is an absolute delight for romantic souls. You can expect extremely hot days with temperatures reaching up to 32C. Don't forget to indulge in adventure activities at Havelock.
If you are a romantic at heart, you will love Lakshadweep. You can expect summer heat and the temperature rising upto 32 degrees. The beaches at Lakshadweep are also worth exploring.
Rekindle your romance at Langkawi. You can expect pleasant temperatures with drizzles during evenings. You can also explore the beautiful beaches of Langkawi.

subText: Say hello to hippie villages and scenic valleys.
desc: Manali is the perfect escape for romance-seekers. You will love the waterfalls and adventure sports. Additionally, you can try out various adventure activities at Manali.
Munnar is an absolute delight for romantic souls. You can expect pleasant weather throughout the day. The wildlife spottings at Munnar are an added bonus.

subText: Colonial Hill Station in Tamil Nadu
desc: Ooty is the perfect escape for romance-seekers. You can expect pleasant weather with temperatures not rising beyond 20 degree Celsius. Don't forget to indulge in adventure activities at Ooty.
